item.title: First TikTok, now smart cars: How Biden’s new proposed ban will affect U.S. automakers
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description:
The White House issued a long-anticipated proposal Monday that would ban Chinese smart cars because internet-connected vehicles pose a national security risk. item.title: Cloudflare’s new marketplace will let websites charge AI bots for scraping

item.description:

item.description:
